reviewText: Three and a half stars, really.  It's formulaic and corny (some scenes make you wonder if you're watching a Japanese version of Mary Poppins -- I'm not kidding), and yet, I warmed to the characters.  The ending's borderline manipulative, but it worked for me.  I was smiling and fighting tears at the same time.  Even now, several weeks after I've watched this, I'm still moved.
